io.spine.server.event

Interface EventReactor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventProducer, EventReceiver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEventReactor, AbstractStatefulReactor, Aggregate, AggregatePart, CatchUpProcess, ProcessManager

    public interface EventReactor
extends EventReceiver, EventProducer
    A event reactor declares methods that receive events and may generate other events in response.

    This means that a reactor does not have to always generate an event.

    See Also:
    @React

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.spine.server.EventProducer

        nothing, producerId, version
